case.state: Awww!!! Misty-Chan's found herself a boyfriend!
Oh Great... It's THAT Day again. to be honest, I never cared for Halloween. Last Year, Len played a prank on me that scared me to death...
Ummm... Happy Halloween? Sorry, It's just never been my holiday.

state.text: Happy Holidays ~player~! Lets get to it!

case.state: Oh Dear... It's that time of year again... to be honest, I'm a little nervous...
Ageage Ageage Ageage... Oh, Sorry! It's just a Friday, and I'm really excited!
Happy Saturday! I can't wait to have some fun with you tonight!
Hello! Happy Monday Everyone! How was work?
Hello There! I'm Hatsune Miku! Nice to meet you!
Hello There! I'm Hatsune Miku! Nice to meet you!
Konichiwa! I'm Hatsune Miku, Digital Singer Extraordinaire! Let's get to it!
Konichiwa! I'm Hatsune Miku, Digital Singer Extraordinaire! Let's get to it!
Konichiwa! I'm ready to put a show on for the crowd!
Ladies and Gentlemen... We have entered the paradox zone.
I have several questions with a severe lack of answers right now.
Hey, Erm... You look familiar. Did we do a concert or something together?
Hey, Do I know you from somewhere?
I feel like I should know who you are, but my mind's drawing a blank right now.
Rin-Chan! What a Surprise!
Hello Rin-Chan! How have you been?
Hello to you too! To be honest, I'm not entirely sure, but welcome to "Strip Poker Night At The Inventory!" I'm Hatsune Miku, and you are?
To be honest with you, I'm not sure where we're at either.
Oh, Hey Amy! Are you wanting that Sonic Outfit back that I used for my last show?
Well Hello Amy! Are you wanting that Sonic Outfit back I borrowed?
You do realize the game is called Strip Poker Night at the Inventory, not Orgy Night at the Inventory, Right?
Oh, hey there... wait a minute. Is that a camera on your hat? What are you planning to do with that?
Hello there... wait, hang on. Is that a camera on your hat? (Is she going to do what I think she's going to do with that thing?)

state.text: Hello There! I see you have blue hair too! It looks nice on you!

case.state: Oh my, another blue-haired person!
Oh hey, some Nintendo guys! One of my games recently dropped on the Switch!
Oh hey! Some players from the Nintendo-verse! I recently had a game drop on the Switch called Project Diva: Megamix
Oh wow, a fellow idol! It's an honor to play this game with you!
A fellow idol? Awesome! I can't wait to play with you!
I know you must be tired from a hard day's work. Just kick back, relax, and enjoy yourself!
I hope your day was good today ~player~-san! Let's just enjoy playing the game!
We're playing "Strip-Poker" Misty. We've got to take SOMETHING off.
Well, I mean this game is called "Strip Poker." If there's nothing for us to take off, it would kind of defeat the point, you know?
Sure! Why not?
I've never been skinny-dipping before...
Wow, this is your classroom? How Cool!
We'd love for you to join! Come on and play!
Sure Thing!

state.text: Wait... Since when did Vampires go extinct? Not that it bothers me, but like, I'd imagine there's still be one or two around.

case.state: Misty-San, I don't think he did.
Look, I understand that you stream, but I don't think this the best thing to broadcast...
Ummm... I'm not entirely sure if you should broadcast this.
Is it really a smart idea to broadcast this?
I think I'd prefer it if only ~player~-San's eyes saw this.
Is she really going to record this?
Look, I'm no stranger to being on camera, but I'd rather this game be kept to the few of us here.
I usually just do stretches before a concert. Pretty simple stuff.
I don't do much, aside from stretching before a concert.
So... One of our opponents is a flying ball of light? I don't see exactly how they'd be able to play strip poker, but I guess we'll just have to wait and see...
A Butterfly? You've got to be kidding me...
It's nice to see a familiar face around here!
Having a familiar face around always makes me feel good!
I hope your weekend has been good so far, ~player~! Just sit back, relax, and enjoy the game!
Hello There! You seem like such a sweet girl! My name is Hatsune Miku!
I still feel like I know you somewhere, but my mind is drawing a blank as to where and when we may have met...

state.text: No, I can't... It's literally standing right behind her...

case.state: So you're a musician? That's awesome! I'm a musician myself, though I'm a Japanese idol instead of a rockstar.
Oh, So another musician! It's great to meet you, even if our styles of music are vastly different.
This is going to be quite a festive game!
I'm ready for a "Holly Jolly" Good Time!
I hope no one tries to play another "Halloween Prank" on me.
I see we have some fellow idols playing with us tonight! Would any of you be interested in performing a number together after this?
Hello Fellow Idols! Care to perform a number together after the game?
So, your name is ~player~? Nice to meet you! I'm Hatsune Miku, but you probably already knew that!
So, your name is ~player~, correct? That's a lovely name! I'm Hatsune Miku, of course!

state.text: I wonder what my hand is going to be like?
I suppose the thrill of strip poker, nay, poker in general, is the randomness of it all.
I'm gonna be honest with you, poker has always made me a bit nervous.
As a performer, you have to take the good with the bad sometimes.
All I want for Christmas are ~cards.text~ ~cards.ifplural(cards|card)~.
Trick or Treat! ~cards.text~ ~cards.ifplural(cards|card)~ please.
May I take ~cards.text~ ~cards.ifplural(cards|card)~ please?

case.state: You won't be seeing my "Sweet Devil" This Round!

state.text: These cards make me want to sing the Ievan Polka!

case.state: Looks like my performance will have to wait awhile!
You won't be seeing my breasts this round!
Looks like I'm keeping my underwear on this round!

state.text: Eh, Could be better, could be worse.
Well, I suppose life is a gamble, isn't it?
This could go either way it seems.
Come On Baby... Please Go My Way...

case.state: Will I have to show off my boobs this round?
Will I have to show off my "Sweet Devil" This round?

state.text: Was I on the Naughty List this year?

case.state: Looks like you might get to see my "Sweet Devil" Soon.
Will I have to perform for the crowd this round?
I might have to take center stage this round...
I swear, this guy isn't fooling anyone...

state.text: Either way, Happy Birthday!
Well, I recently got abducted by aliens, because they wanted me to perform a concert for them, so that was pretty interesting!
Yes She Is!

case.state: Okay then... I don't even want to know how that even works...

state.text: Awww!!! That's so sweet!

case.state: That was so sweet of you Amalia! I love it when friends support each other!

You two are so cute together!
Hey, I won't judge! Your body is uniquely you!

case.state: Like I said, you're body is uniquely you, and no one should judge you for it Arash!

state.text: I came to relieve some of the stress of being a performance. And hey, I'm also really famous, so don't worry! A lot of famous people come through here!
I came to take some time off from my performances. And Don't Worry, a lot of famous people come through here, so you're good!

case.state: Hang On... What's A "Grower?" Oh Wait... I know...

state.text: Wait... What? I didn't see what she dropped!

case.state: Oh! Happy Birthday! I'm Hatsune Miku!
Happy Birthday! My name is Hatsune Miku, digital singer from Japan!

state.text: I think so. I know that I saw at least one guy spill a beer. Personally, I usually just drink a can of vegetable juice myself.
Awww!!! That's so sweet!
I think I saw a pool-house over there somewhere.
Do you have Project Diva: Megamix on there?
Happy Birthday Jason!
Well, I guess when all your options are shit, you just go with what the least painful option is.
If you don't want to do talk about it, that's okay. Sometimes we have to make difficult decisions.

case.state: Since I'm a performer myself, I might be a little biased by saying this, but I love the kind of music I perform!

state.text: Oh? Please tell us more!
Well, I'm relatively new here, so I don't know...

case.state: I'll probably just hang out on the beach and chill for a little while.

state.text: Wait... what on earth are you talking about?

case.state: Hmmm... That's a good question. I know this a bit of a cop out, but Pikachu is probably mine.
I've never actually done anything with Pokemon before, but if I had to choose a favorite, it would probably be Pikachu.
While I do eat, since I'm digital, I can't exactly gain weight, and to be honest, I'm glad for it.
I know my tag says I'm a robot, but I'm technically a digital singer. Even so, I don't have any humans in my life, aside from the crowds that watch me perform.

state.text: Just go straight up to him and tell him how you feel! That's the advice I'd give anyone!
Just tell him how you feel!
Okay, that was weird.
I'm digital, so could that happen to me too?

case.state: Not Really, No.
I've never tried it, but I don't think I'd care to feel a guy's dick in my butt hole...

state.text: Nice to meet you both in that case! Should I introduce myself again?
Wow! That's so cool!

case.state: Honestly, I don't know what I would want personally in a partner, I suppose I'd want someone who is kind and caring.
Beats me. What were you?
Well, I certainly don't know. would you mind telling us?
Sadly, I don't read a lot, so I don't really have any good recommendations.

state.text: You've got a point there Ribbon-chan.
Truer words, never spoken.
Well, I suppose my dream is already being fulfilled: to entertain people with my music.
Personally, My dream has already come true, to entertain people with my music. I love seeing people smile!
I've got another concert coming up that I have to prepare for. Being an idol isn't easy!
OH NO... ARE YOU GOING AFTER MY BRAINS?! Oh Wait, I'm digital. phew!
PLEASE DON'T EAT MY BRAINS!!! Oh wait, I'm digital, so I'm good! Thank god!
Somebody help me...

case.state: I wish I could, but I've got to highball it to my next concert after I leave here. Thanks for the offer though!
Sadly, I have not seen any "lewd" artifacts, nor do I care to talk about what my supposed "favorite" is.
A good question, for sure. To be honest, I think it depends on how you define "important". There's at least a million answers one could throw out.
Personally, I'm very skeptical of the claims of how the world was supposedly created in 7 days. I mean, it probably took millions of years, so why 7 Days?
I've always been a fan of Mitchie M.! They've written a lot of my songs! (I've never been sure if they are a boy or a girl...)

state.text: Sorry, but bets make me nervous.
No Thanks.
Unfortunately, I've got nothing.
Sorry, Cynthia-chan. I don't really know anything.
Unfortunately, I do not. Sorry!
Ummm... I don't think so?
No thanks. Bets make me nervous...
Oh, there are plenty, but I'm not getting into that.

case.state: To tell you the truth Pyrrha-Chan, I'm already famous, but it's not always as glamorous as people make it out to be.
Personally, I believe friendship is constituted by how close you are to a person, though that also depends on whether that's in a good or bad way.
No, I don't really go shopping, though I believe I have performed at a mall once or twice. I can't remember what mall specifically though.
I don't really have any book recommendations off of the top of my head, but I heard "Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone" is pretty good.
Are you referring to American Football or Soccer? Either way, I don't play either.
Well, I suppose you could say that, but in reality, I think this bar is a world unto itself.
Wait... You mean to tell me you have more wives?

state.text: One or two, but nothing really worth sharing.
I don't like them at all. A lie is a lie, no matter how harmless it may seem.
I don't really care for them.
Family is one of the most important things to me! Me and my fellow Vocaloids basically are a family!
To be honest, I'm not entirely sure how I'd spend all that money.
I guess it depends on how severe the mistake is, but in most cases, no.

case.state: (I wonder what or who's she's thinking about? She seems to have someone on her mind...)
Well, I suppose that's subjective, isn't it? But personally, I think ~human~ will have the cutest nude body!

state.text: Awwww!!! ~player~-san has a lover!

case.state: 2 pairs of royal flushes... I'm not buying it...
Alright Ayano-chan. I'm sorry, I just get really worried when I see things like this.

state.text: I think you did the better job! It's not easy masking up the fact you're a zombie!

Amy, I cannot get over how beautiful your singing is! Would you like to perform together sometime?
Your singing voice is so beautiful! I cannot get enough of it!
You sing so beautifully Amy! You're making my heart melt!
Hey, I'm keeping my headset on, so that's fair.
You might want to drop the knife when you're masturbating though...
Amy, your singing voice is so gorgeous!
Amy, your singing voice is like an angel!
Your singing voice is amazing! How long have you been singing for?
Wow Amy... you have a beautiful singing voice!
Wow Amy, you've got a beautiful singing voice!
Amy, you're singing voice is gorgeous!
Amy, your singing voice is absolutely gorgeous!
Please keep singing Amy! Your voice is gorgeous!

case.state: Well, you certainly had me fooled there for awhile.
Sounds fancy!
Ayano-chan, It's clear something has gone horribly wrong in your life. If you ever need to talk, I'm always here.
I don't like or dislike them. I'm okay with them, I just wouldn't care to get one myself.
Hey, It's your preference, so I won't judge. It looks really good on you though!
As a performer, I face critics all the time. It can get really annoying, so I certainly understand how you feel.
Indeed! I'd invite all my Vocaloid friends to play! Rin, Len, Luka, MEIKO, KAITO, Gumi, etc...!

state.text: To be honest, I'm not entirely sure, but I think they exist "on the outside", if you get my meaning.
My favorite outfit is the one I'm wearing right now! I've had it since day one!
I have a lot of outfits that I get to wear, but my favorite is the one I'm wearing right now!
Personally, I always love a good old can of vegetable juice! It's both good and good for you!
Hey, we all have our own fashion choices. Don't make fun of someone else's.
Ummm... I don't think that's going to work.
I love a lot of holidays, though I think my favorite is Christmas, since I have special outfits to wear for concerts!
I guess I consider my fellow Vocaloids as siblings, but I don't have any "biological" siblings.
I always bring a can of vegetable juice! It's good for you know!
I always bring my headset with me. I mean, what the point of performing if you can't make yourself heard?
I've been a lot of places, but personally, I like to stay in my home country of Japan.
The one I'm wearing right now!
Only on nights when I perform. I often have to stay up late.
Ummm... wouldn't that be cheating if I told you?
If I told you, it would make things too easy.
Perhaps there's an ATM machine around here somewhere?
No Thanks. I've got to hightail it to my next concert after this.
Thanks for the offer, but unfortunately, I'll have to pass, my next concert is tomorrow night.
I enjoy hanging out with my fellow Vocaloids!
Okay then... moving on...

case.state: Well, You can always throw the game.
I don't really have a home per-say. I tend to move around from place to place, or rather, from concert to concert.

state.text: Honestly, this is the only good stripping game I've ever played.
I hope she's alright. That's got to be rather cold...
I was going to bring some leeks and vegetable juice, but I forgot.

case.state: Personally, I don't have a preference! They're both equally as beautiful in my eyes!
Oh, that's easy, Leeks and Vegetable Juice! Okay, I know the latter is a drink, but you still consume it, so it counts!

state.text: Why would you carry ducks in a hoodie?

case.state: Hmmmm... A good question. I don't have a particular favorite, but I do like roses and daisies. Bluebells are also nice.
No, I never had, mainly because I've never needed to.
To be honest, I don't really know. I'd probably have to say a bunny, since my pigtails kind of look like a bunny's ears.
I'd say I think in a little bit of both. I usually have internal monologues while I'm preparing for a performance.
No. I don't even drink anything aside from Vegetable Juice...
I usually tend to think about how my next concert's going to go. That's where most of my sleepless nights come from.
Since I'm digital, and I don't get out much, I suppose I can handle either pretty easily. If I had a preference for which I liked better though, I'd say the heat.
I don't really cook, as I don't really need to eat. But when I do eat, I'm usually just able to order food off the internet or something. I still have no clue how I can even eat...
I love to sing! It's my job as an idol after all!
I absolutely enjoy singing! It's my job as an idol to sing, so why wouldn't I enjoy it?
I don't really read that much...
My name doesn't really mean anything special, unfortunately. Or at least, I don't think so...
Hey! That would be completely unfair to the rest of us!
I've always loved summer! The warm weather always puts me in good spirits!

state.text: Whatever makes you more comfortable, just do it.
Sayaka-chan, I think you look absolutely adorable!
You're absolutely gorgeous my friend! Don't let anyone tell you different!
I don't really care to answer any of those questions. I don't exactly have sex that often...

case.state: I wouldn't say seducing is the smartest idea. Instead, just come up to her, and just act like yourself, but whatever you do, don't be creepy.
Unfortunately, I have not. Sorry!

state.text: Just walk up and be a friendly person! Don't try to be too flirtatious.
That's a... disturbingly specific question. Frankly, I don't think I'd care for any of the 3 options.

case.state: The word "leek" has always been funny to me, as it can be used to describe a "drip" or a vegetable. Those are 2 things I never thought would go together, yet here we are.
There's so much to see and do on this wonderful planet! There's so much, in fact, I don't think I can talk about all of it!
Not bad, but I think it could be a bit more creative.
A good start, but I think you should put some more thought into it.
Performing while playing? I like the way you think Shantae-chan!

state.text: I don't have in me to kill...
I don't exactly want to kill, and not just because it's not part of my program either.
As you can plainly see, blue is my color!

I heard about from one of my fellow Vocaloids, and thought it would be a fun place to spend the day. It's kind of boring doing absolutely nothing in your diva room until your next performance, you know?
I've never actually thought about that. I guess I'll have to think it over.
I don't usually spend a lot of time naked.
The Microphone, easily.
Personally, I find the ability to fly really cool! You'd get to see the world from above! Plus, who doesn't dream about flying?
I'm going to be real, I don't think I can get more humiliated than the time I got pranked by Len and Rin last Halloween.
I hear Avengers Endgame is pretty cool!
I think the cinema the next block over is playing some stuff from Studio Ghibli.
I've heard some good things about the latest Disney Movie from a friend.

case.state: To be entirely honest, I'm not really sure.

No. It's a Country in east Asia. Many of the characters here originate from there!

Not really, no.
No, unfortunately, I have not.
I've never really thought about this before, so to be honest, I don't know if I'm able to answer this question accurately.

Are you talking about my hair? It's nothing special, Really.
If you're talking about my hair, I assure you, there's nothing that special about it.

Not Really. As a digital singer, I've never found any desire to play any sport.
I'd say yes in a physical sense. However, they've experienced different memories than you have. So in that case, I'd say they'd be a different person.
Physically? Yes. However, everyone goes through their own experiences, so in that case, no.

Streaming-Chan, I'm know I'm often on camera, but you streaming this game makes me feel a bit uncomfortable.

case.state: Streaming-Chan, I am seriously getting sick and tired of you streaming this live. This is making me incredibly uncomfortable. If you don't cut that camera off, I swear to Mitchie M., I will..

state.text: Hey, whatever makes you feel comfortable while performing, do it. We won't judge!

No need to worry! Do you whatever makes you feel the most comfortable while performing!

Thankfully, no. All of my fellow Vocaloids get along together very well.
I find MEIKO and KAITO to be really cute together, although I'm not exactly sure if they're dating or not.
Interesting! It seems like you have a close connection with your band mates. I certainly do with mine!
That sounds just like my friend Rin! She's always full of life and energy!
That would be my friend Rin Kagamine! She's always bright and bubbly!
Hey It's quite alright!

Oh, Do Tell! I'd love some to listen to one!
I don't usually do bets, but this doesn't seem too bad, so I accept your wager Ribbon-chan.
I'd go up to them and give them a big hug! I know how scary the world can be, so the best thing I can do is to offer my support!

It helps to keep your groin area nice and clean. Besides, it doesn't look pretty...
To be honest... I'm not entirely sure.
I don't really know anyone like that.

Not Really. The Closest person to that is probably my friend KAITO, but he really isn't that tough.
No, Not Really.
The only person that I remember getting sick was this one guy at one of my concerts.
I like it better that way. I know I perform in concerts with hundreds of viewers, but this isn't something that I care to have broadcasted.
I absolutely do! The Kagamine twins, Len and Rin! They always seem to be together, but I've only ever seen Rin around the inventory...
I could always sing a song!
Well, I am an idol, so I could set up a bit of an impromptu performance here if you'd like!

case.state: Personally, the worst case of "bad luck" I ever had was a really, really rough concert a couple years back.
Leeks and vegetable Juice!
I haven't been in love. I don't tend to interact with many people aside from my fellow Vocaloids, but I've never had feelings for any of them.
That's an... oddly specific question, and one which I'll have to give a resounding "No" to.

state.text: Lucario's in Smash? That's so cool!

This is actually my first time.
I don't see any scar! Your butt is as clean as... well, you know.
You did amazing Nagisa! Your performance was absolutely stunning!
I have! It's a beautiful place!

case.state: To my knowledge, this dimension is literally just a place people come to play Strip-Poker at. That's it.
Well, Doesn't that kind of defeat the point of Poker?
Okay then...
I've never exactly been out and about, so a chance to see a forest would be a welcome change!

case.state: No, and to be quite frank, I don't think I would care to be.

I don't know about any of the local specialties, but there's a really good pizza place down the road I'm told.

Well, in that case, mine should be pretty obvious, isn't it? It's blue! Or I suppose, Cyan would be more accurate.

Hey, no need to feel upset with the gift you've been given! We've all got something that makes us unique!
Most of us don't have wings, but most of us don't have ice powers either! You've got something that makes you uniquely you! No need to change it!
You did very well! Bravo!
You did good, although asking for praise isn't exactly very professional...
Sure! We could use a back-up band for our next concert!

Well, I'm not entirely sure. Wait... did you say horses talk in your dimension?

Hey, if you keep working at it, I'm sure you'll get all the way there!

state.text: You did a marvelous job! Bravo!
I'm still at a loss as to where I know you from. You look familiar, but I just can't put my finger on it.
You look incredibly familiar, but I still can't seem to remember where you're from.
I swear I know you from somewhere, but as to where, I'm not exactly sure.

case.state: (I wonder who he's thinking about? He seems to have someone on his mind.)
I wish I had one. But sadly, I don't. I've always wanted a puppy though.
My home country of Japan's a great place to explore!
Sadly, I don't really play sports. They're not really my thing.
I'm a singer, so I love all sorts of songs, but my favorites are the ones me and my fellow Vocaloids have performed!
I see we have a couple other idols here! How have your recent performances been?
So, to my fellow idols, how do you find the performing life?
Have you enjoyed your recent performances, my fellow idols?
So, Do y'all have any favorite love songs?
So, I'm curious, do any of you have a favorite love song?
Hey, question: What's your favorite love song?
You know, for some reason, people say I wrote Harry Potter and developed Minecraft, and I don't understand why. Could someone explain that to me please?
Have you ever tried Vegetable Juice? It's my favorite thing to drink!
Have any of you drank vegetable juice? It's my favorite drink!
So. What's your favorite thing to drink? For me, it's GOT to be a can of vegetable juice!
